questions.question: Is it any use ............................. to the manager?
questions.description: The gerund is used after expressions like it is no use, it is not worth, it is no good, what about etc.

questions.question: What about .......................... a short break?
questions.description: The gerund is used after what about.

questions.question: There is no point in ................................ any longer.
questions.description: The gerund is used after a preposition.

questions.question: He spent years ............................. care of his ailing mother.
I am interested in ............................. to cook.
questions.description: The gerund is used after a preposition.

questions.question: I wasted hours ............................ for him.
questions.description: The ing form is used after spend and waste.

questions.question: Is it worth ........................... Dublin?
questions.description: The gerund is used after is it worth?

questions.question: He does not have enough money ............................... on a foreign vacation.
I was sad .............................. about his fate.
questions.description: The infinitive is used after certain adjectives like happy, sad, glad, difficult etc.

questions.question: Please give him another chance ............................... his mettle.
questions.description: The infinitive is used after nouns like chance, decision, advice, ability etc.
